projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: A rudimentary store front for a fictional food product 'Salmon Cookies'. One of my first projects to incorporate HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

projects.title: Battle Dice
projects.description: A simple low-stakes dice game where you pick your dice (constructor) and play against a computer. The user puts in a username and blood type (form) for the leaderboard later on. The player with a higher roll will win. Under the game itself, it saves the results whether you win or loose (local storage).

projects.title: Project TBD
projects.description: This is a placeholder for an undetermined project. Who knows.... it could be the next angry birds.
